column4: I'm having problems with gstreamer's theora playback being extremely jerky (CPU isn't pegged, and the audio stream plays smoothly), is there anything I can do to fix this short of installing mplayer or totem-xine?
i had the same problem! i just put totem-xine on
basically i think it's gstreamer isn't ready yet
I kind of got that impression too... it seems to basically work, but has enough issues that I'm not sure why it was chosen as the "out-of-the-box" solution
